defaultValue: Welcome to Stocks! Here, you'll be able to add tickers to your Pebble's watchlist, as well as configure other settings such as Timeline Pins.

items.defaultValue:
Lets get you started. To add a ticker to your Pebble, enter the ticker symbol(s) to the text input below, separated by a comma and a space.
Due to API limits, these changes will take effect the next time you open the app.
